page.title: 10EDUCATION IN HAMBLEDON
page.content:
{ HAMBLEDON COUNTY FIRST SCHOOL No.of children on roll: 47 No.of permanent staff: 2 No.of children resident in village: 25 Other children come from: Denmead, Southwick,Droxford,Soberton,East Meon and Waterlooville. No.of children having school lunch: 41 No.of people employed in school meals service: 2+2 supervisory assistants. No.of caretakers: 1,No.of cleaners: 1.
There is an active "Friends of Hambledon School" organisation which raises funds for equipment etc.Some Hambledon children attend private schools outside the village such as Eton, Churchers, Bedales, Rookesbury Park, Ditcham Park, St John's College, Portsmouth Grammar School and Portsmouth High.
